name: Trobriand
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak
immune: fire, poison, psychic; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from nonmagical attacks that aren't adamantine
conditionImmune: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

trait.name: Fire Absorption
text: Whenever Trobriand is subjected to fire damage, it takes no damage and instead regains a number of hit points equal to the fire damage dealt.

trait.name: Immutable Form
text: Trobriand is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
text: Trobriand has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Slam
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 20 (3d8 + 7) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Sword
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +13 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 23 (3d10 + 7) slashing damage.

action.name: Poison Breath (Recharge 5-6)
text: Trobriand exhales poisonous gas in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 19 Constitution saving throw, taking 45 (10d8) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

description: Source: Waterdeep: Dungeon of the Mad Mage p. 294
